Title: A Day at the Races
Writer: Robert Pirosh (screen play), George Seaton (screen play), George Oppenheimer (screen play), Robert Pirosh (original story), George Seaton (original story)
Actors: Groucho Marx, Chico Marx, Harpo Marx, Allan Jones
Plot: A veterinarian posing as a doctor and a race-horse owner and his friends struggle to help keep a sanitarium open with the help of a misfit race-horse.
